name: UX Friday
description:
UX Friday is a design system template made to be flexible, customizable and interactive from the get go. The template includes over 500 of the most commonly used UX components and styles so all you need to do is inject your brand and get started without reinventing the wheel. UX Friday also utilizes interactive components to create realistic, motion-integrated prototypes.


Current Version (Free Beta):

  • 549 components
  • 79 styles
  • Interactive components


What's next

  • Mobile components
  • Dashboard components
  • Interactive prototypes and transitions


Created by @piyushd and @dianajro at Innovatemap (coincidentally, on Fridays)
